snippet: Researchers find that social status may directly affect immune gene expression in groups of rhesus macaques.
abstract: Jenny Tung study in the Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences finds that social stress affects the immune system of female rhesus macaques at the genetic level.
lead_paragraph: Researchers find that social status may directly affect immune gene expression in groups of rhesus macaques.

headline.print_headline: Changes in Social Status Seen in Monkeys’ Genes
headline.main: Changes in Social Status Seen in Gene Regulation in Monkeys

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences
